text: The 2019 Taça de Portugal Final was the last match of the 2018–19 Taça de Portugal, which decided the winners of the 79th season of the Taça de Portugal. It was played on 25 May 2019 at the Estádio Nacional in Oeiras, between Sporting CP and Porto. The defending champions were Desportivo das Aves, however, they were knocked out in the quarter-finals by Braga. ==Route to the final== {| style="width:100%; text-align:center;" |- style="vertical-
